description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your ship's magnetic powers to beat 20 varying levels filled with enemies and power-ups! Play by yourself or with a friend in this challenging space shoot-em-up!
